text:
When a page with a user-constraint of CONFIDENTIAL or INTEGRAL (HTTPS) forwards 
to a page that has a user-constraint of NONE, the page is still in HTTPS mode.  
I've attached a patch that resolves this issue.
creator: bonhamcm@thirdeyeconsulting.com
bonhamcm@thirdeyeconsulting.com
text:
Created attachment 8949
Unidiff patch for AuthenticatorBase.java

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
NONE means that the application does not require any transport guarantees. This
patch will force users back to HTTP which is opposite of the NONE constraint.
